verbose_text: In the kidney, activation of RAGE with AGEs or other oxidized, dityrosine containing protein products may induce podocyte apoptosis, generation of monocyte chemoattractant peptide-1, and transforming growth factor-beta, leading to albuminuria, and glomerular sclerosis [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: induce podocyte apoptosis, generation of monocyte chemoattractant peptide-1, and transforming growth factor-beta
